episodes.title: Shochou Magellan Ugoku: Kansei! Mugiwara Houimou
episodes.plot: Magellan finally receives word of Luffy's break-in, and decides to gather his forces to Level 4, to cut off Luffy and his allies.

episodes.title: Zensenryoku Shuuketsu! Level 4 Shounetsu Jigoku no Kessen
episodes.plot: Luffy and his team fall to the hot fire while Magellan works out the plan to capture them.

episodes.title: Magellan Tsuyoshi! Bon Clay Tekizen Toubou
episodes.plot: Luffy begins fighting Magellan despite Bentham's warnings to flee, and finds that he is unable to go on the offensive because of Magellan's poisonous body and long-range poison attacks.

episodes.title: Shiyuu Kessu! Sutemi no Luffy Saigo no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Magellan has Luffy backed into a corner and is using his devil fruit powers to poison Luffy.

episodes.title: Dachi Dakara: Bon Clay Kesshi no Kyuushutsukou
episodes.plot: Luffy is thrown into a cell where he is left to die of poisoning.

episodes.title: Jigoku ni Rakuen! Impel Down Level 5.5
episodes.plot: Mr. 2 apologizes for abandoning Luffy and searches for Ivankov.

episodes.title: Luffy Chiryou Kaishi: Ivan-san Kiseki no Chikara!!
episodes.plot: Emporio Ivankov displays some of his powers, including stopping a vengeful pirate's cannon shot merely by winking.

episodes.title: Kiseki o Shinjite! Bon Clay Tamashii no Seien
episodes.plot: Bentham learns that Ivankov has the ability to control hormones.

episodes.title: Luffy Fukkatsu! Iwa-san Datsugoku Keikaku Shidou!!
episodes.plot: As Luffy is finally revived, he is informed by Emporio Ivankov about Iva's background.

episodes.title: Ace Gosou Kaishi: Saikasou Level 6 no Koubou!
episodes.plot: When Luffy made it to Level 6 with Ivankov and Inazuma, they met up with the former cellmate of Ace, Jinbe.

episodes.title: Saikyou Team Kessei: Shinkan! Inpel Down
episodes.plot: Luffy is reluctant to free Crocodile, but Ivankov offers to keep him in line by blackmailing him with a weakness he knows about.

episodes.title: Saranaru Konran! Kurohige Teach Shuurai!
episodes.plot: While Luffy and his allies continue fighting on Level 4 of Impel Down, Buggy and Mr. 3 reach Level 2 and release the prisoners there to cause a riot to cover their escape.

episodes.title: Kiken na Deai! Kurohige to Ame no Shiryuu
episodes.plot: The Jailer Beasts arrive and overpower many of the prisoners, but Luffy, Jinbe and Crocodile defeat them in a single attack each.

episodes.title: Iji demo Taorenu! Honki no Hannyabaru
episodes.plot: Luffy fights Hannyabal who tries to stop the escapees, but then Blackbeard shows up and breaks up the fight between Luffy and Hannyabal.

episodes.title: Ikari no Jet Pistol: Luffy vs Kurohige
episodes.plot: Although Luffy wants a proper battle with Blackbeard, Jinbe reminds him there's no time for that as Ace's execution will occur in only a few short hours.

episodes.title: Magellan o Tomero! Iva-san Ougi Sakuretsu
episodes.plot: Luffy and the other prisoners are getting closer to the surface, having made it through levels 3 and 2.

episodes.title: Magellan no Kisaku! Habamareta Datsugoku Keikaku
episodes.plot: Luffy becomes enraged after learning about Magellan defeating Emporio Ivankov and Inazuma, but Mr. 2 and Jinbe persuade him that escaping takes priority.

episodes.title: Datsugoku Team Zettaizetsumei: Kinjite "Venom Demon"
episodes.plot: Jinbe, Crocodile and Daz Bones finally secure a Marine vessel to escape with. Meanwhile, Luffy continues his fight against Magellan, with the assistance of Galdino's Doru Doru no Mi powers.

episodes.title: Okose Saigo no Kiseki: Seigi no Mon o Toppa Seyo
episodes.plot: Bentham puts himself on the line to save Luffy and the others, by disguising himself as Warden Magellan.

episodes.title: Mezase Kaigun Honbu: Ace Kyuushutsu e no Funade!
episodes.plot: Shiliew saves Blackbeard and his crew by giving them antidotes to Magellan's poison before taking the opportunity to join with them.

episodes.title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Weatheria Report to Cyborg Animal
episodes.plot: As Luffy's ship heads to the Marine Headquarters, the scene shifts to a point some time in the past.

episodes.title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Hina to Momoiro no Taiketsu
episodes.plot: Sanji is chased by okamas to Caroline - the queen's stand in.

episodes.title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kakumeigun to Boushoku no Mori no Wana!
episodes.plot: Robin was captured by the guards of Tequila Wolf and was sent to the Prison Tower.

episodes.title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyodai na Bohyou to Pantsu no On
episodes.plot: While heading to the sea to return to the Sabaody Archipelago, Zoro and Perona stumble upon an enormous tombstone. Brook decides he has to wait to find Luffy and the others until he can fulfill his debt to the people of Harahettania.

episodes.title: Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Kyoudai no Chikai!
episodes.plot: Luffy recalls his childhood with Ace and meeting Marshall D. Teach in Jaya without knowing who he was.

episodes.title: Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Shuuketsu! San Taishou
episodes.plot: While Luffy's on his way to rescue Ace, everyone at Marine Headquarters gets ready for the execution.

episodes.title: Kessen no Toki Semaru! Kaigun Saikyou no Fujin Kansei!
episodes.plot: Only three hours remain until Ace's execution. Luffy reaches Marineford but finds the Gates of Justice closed.

episodes.title: Kyodai Kantai Arawaru: Shuurai! Shirohige Kaizokudan
episodes.plot: The world is shocked by the revelation of Ace's father's identity.

episodes.title: Kessen no Makuake! Ace to Shirohige no Kako
episodes.plot: Whitebeard reveals his Devil Fruit powers in front of the Marines.

episodes.title: Sekai o Horobosu Chikara! Guragura no Mi no Nouryoku
episodes.plot: The sea-quakes made by Whitebeard cause a tsunami to come upon Marineford.

episodes.title: Subete o Yakitsukusu!! Taishou Akainu no Chikara!
episodes.plot: All the various Whitebeard Commanders show off their skills and abilities, as do some Marines.

episodes.title: Majin no Shison! Little Oars Jr. Bakushin!
episodes.plot: Oars Jr. goes straight for Ace, but the Giant Squad attempts to stop him without much success.

episodes.title: Shousha dake ga Seigi Hatsudou! Sengoku no Sakusen!
episodes.plot: Koby and Helmeppo attempted to flee from the war after feeling too overwhelmed by the deaths and chaos, but stumbled upon Akainu and an apparent plan by Sengoku.

episodes.title: Mugiwara Team Touchaku Fuunkyuu o Tsugeru Senjou
episodes.plot: Luffy finally shows up together with his formed alliance from the escaped prisoners of Impel Down.

episodes.title: Shinde mo Tasukeru: Luffy vs Kaigun Battle Start
episodes.plot: With Luffy as their inspiration, the other pirates fight back with renewed vigor.

episodes.title: Gekisen no Renzoku! Nouryokusha Gundan VS Nouryokusha Gundan
episodes.plot: One battle after another, it is complete chaos out on the battlefield.

episodes.title: Kuma ni Okita Ihen Iva-san Ikari no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Luffy receives the key to Ace's handcuffs from Hancock, who then fantasizes about a wedding ceremony held on Amazon Lily.

episodes.title: Kengou Mihawk Luffy ni Semaru Kokutou no Zangeki
episodes.plot: Luffy stumbles upon Mihawk, whom he tries to avoid.

episodes.title: Senmetsu Sakusen Shidou: Pacifista Gundan no Iryoku
episodes.plot: The Pacifista enter Marineford as part of Sengoku's plan to win the war against Whitebeard.

episodes.title: Akainu no Bouryaku! Otoshiirerareta Shirohige
episodes.plot: As Squard stabs Whitebeard, the pirates and even marines in the war are shocked due to his betrayal.

episodes.title: Houiheki Sadou! Shirohige Kaizokudan Zettaizetsumei!!
episodes.plot: In a desperate attempt to stop Whitebeard from advancing to the execution platform, the Marines activate walls to block Whitebeard's path, but gets stopped by the ice.

episodes.title: Shokei Shikkou Shirei Kudaru: Houiheki o Toppa Seyo!
episodes.plot: Akainu's Meteor Volcano melts the nearly all the ice and destroys the Whitebeard Pirates' ships, dropping them into boiling water, enabling the cannons on the wall to bombard them while the Pacifistas block the way out.

episodes.title: Saishuu Kyokumen Totsunyuu! Shirohige Kishikaisei no Itte
episodes.plot: Luffy attempts to slip past the admirals, but Kizaru easily catches up to him and knocks him to the ground.

episodes.title: Luffy Chikaratsuku! Oris Hiroba no Souryokusen!!
episodes.plot: Ace thinks back to his childhood, when he fought with anyone who spoke ill of Roger, and wondering if he should ever have been born.

episodes.title: Inochi o Kezuru Chikara: Tension Hormone Futatabi
episodes.plot: Whitebeard falters for a moment as a result of his age and physical condition.

episodes.title: Yakusoku no Tame ni!! Gekitou! Luffy to Coby
episodes.plot: Luffy with his newly restored strength continues on to the execution platform to save Ace and is warned by Ivankov that the hormones only trick his body.

episodes.title: Shokeidai Mokuzen! Hirakareta Ace e no Michi!!
episodes.plot: Luffy uses Haki unintentionally just as Ace is about to be executed.

episodes.title: Sorezore no Eranda Michi: Luffy vs Garp!
episodes.plot: Luffy unwillingly hits Garp, who is blocking his way to Ace. As Garp falls, the bridge crumbles.

episodes.title: Ace Kyuushutsu! Shirohige Saigo no Senchou Meirei!
episodes.plot: Ace is freed at last as he and Luffy fight their way back to escape from Marineford.
